If it starts to smell or clump up trow it away immediately Add new Makeup submit Add to Calendar Concealer Product Information: TIPS : Brand Add New Makeup Lipstick Brow Pencil Blush Eyeshadow //Cruetly part Why is Cruelty free makeup important? As we know today that more and more makeup brands are producing cruelty makeup. Cruelty free isn\'t just a hashtag or a trend to jump on. It a movement that was first started by Lady Dowding back in 1959 when she introduced "Beauty without cruelty". She persuaded manufacturers to use fake fur instead of real fur. How would you know if your makeup is cruelty free? Here is a quick link to Cruelty Free Kitty They have a list of the most current brands that are Cruelty Free
Type of Blush
Cream
Powder
